verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. In thee, O YY <WH3068>, do I put my trust <WH2620> <WH8804>; let me never <WH408> <WH5769> be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799>: deliver <WH6403> <WH8761> me in thy righteousness <WH6666>.

Bow down <WH5186> <WH8685> thine ear <WH241> to me; deliver <WH5337> <WH8685> me speedily <WH4120>: be thou my strong <WH4581> rock <WH6697>, for an house <WH1004> of defence <WH4686> to save <WH3467> <WH8687> me.
For thou art my rock <WH5553> and my fortress <WH4686>; therefore for thy name's <WH8034> sake lead <WH5148> <WH8686> me, and guide <WH5095> <WH8762> me.
Pull me out <WH3318> <WH8686> of the net <WH7568> that <WH2098> they have laid privily <WH2934> <WH8804> for me: for thou art my strength <WH4581>.
Into thine hand <WH3027> I commit <WH6485> <WH8686> my spirit <WH7307>: thou hast redeemed <WH6299> <WH8804> me, O YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH410> of truth <WH571>.
I have hated <WH8130> <WH8804> them that regard <WH8104> <WH8802> lying <WH7723> vanities <WH1892>: but I trust <WH982> <WH8804> in the YY <WH3068>.

I will be glad <WH1523> <WH8799> and rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799> in thy mercy <WH2617>: for thou hast considered <WH7200> <WH8804> my trouble <WH6040>; thou hast known <WH3045> <WH8804> my soul <WH5315> in adversities <WH6869>;
And hast not shut me up <WH5462> <WH8689> into the hand <WH3027> of the enemy <WH341> <WH8802>: thou hast set <WH5975> <WH8689> my feet <WH7272> in a large room <WH4800>.

Have mercy <WH2603> <WH8798> upon me, O YY <WH3068>, for I am in trouble <WH6887> <WH8804>: mine eye <WH5869> is consumed <WH6244> <WH8804> with grief <WH3708>, yea, my soul <WH5315> and my belly <WH990>.

For my life <WH2416> is spent <WH3615> <WH8804> with grief <WH3015>, and my years <WH8141> with sighing <WH585>: my strength <WH3581> faileth <WH3782> <WH8804> because of mine iniquity <WH5771>, and my bones <WH6106> are consumed <WH6244> <WH8804>.

I was a reproach <WH2781> among all mine enemies <WH6887> <WH8802>, but especially <WH3966> among my neighbours <WH7934>, and a fear <WH6343> to mine acquaintance <WH3045> <WH8794>: they that did see <WH7200> <WH8802> me without <WH2351> fled <WH5074> <WH8804> from me.
I am forgotten <WH7911> <WH8738> as a dead man <WH4191> <WH8801> out of mind <WH3820>: I am like a broken <WH6> <WH8802> vessel <WH3627>.

For I have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> the slander <WH1681> of many <WH7227>: fear <WH4032> was on every side <WH5439>: while they took counsel <WH3245> <WH8736> together <WH3162> against me, they devised <WH2161> <WH8804> to take away <WH3947> <WH8800> my life <WH5315>.
But I trusted <WH982> <WH8804> in thee, O YY <WH3068>: I said <WH559> <WH8804>, Thou art my 'Elohim <WH430>.
My times <WH6256> are in thy hand <WH3027>: deliver <WH5337> <WH8685> me from the hand <WH3027> of mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>, and from them that persecute <WH7291> <WH8802> me.
Make thy face <WH6440> to shine <WH215> <WH8685> upon thy servant <WH5650>: save <WH3467> <WH8685> me for thy mercies <WH2617> ' sake.

Let me not be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799>, O YY <WH3068>; for I have called <WH7121> <WH8804> upon thee: let the wicked <WH7563> be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799>, and let them be silent <WH1826> <WH8799> in the grave <WH7585>.

Let the lying <WH8267> lips <WH8193> be put to silence <WH481> <WH8735>; which speak <WH1696> <WH8802> grievous <WH6277> things proudly <WH1346> and contemptuously <WH937> against the righteous <WH6662>.

Oh how great <WH7227> is thy goodness <WH2898>, which thou hast laid up <WH6845> <WH8804> for them that fear <WH3373> thee; which thou hast wrought <WH6466> <WH8804> for them that trust <WH2620> <WH8802> in thee before the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120> !

Thou shalt hide <WH5641> <WH8686> them in the secret <WH5643> of thy presence <WH6440> from the pride <WH7407> of man <WH376>: thou shalt keep them secretly <WH6845> <WH8799> in a pavilion <WH5521> from the strife <WH7379> of tongues <WH3956>.
Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be the YY <WH3068>: for he hath shewed me his marvellous <WH6381> <WH8689> kindness <WH2617> in a strong <WH4692> city <WH5892>.

For I said <WH559> <WH8804> in my haste <WH2648> <WH8800>, I am cut off <WH1629> <WH8738> from before <WH5048> thine eyes <WH5869>: nevertheless <WH403> thou heardest <WH8085> <WH8804> the voice <WH6963> of my supplications <WH8469> when I cried <WH7768> <WH8763> unto thee.

O love <WH157> <WH8798> the YY <WH3068>, all ye his saints <WH2623>: for the YY <WH3068> preserveth <WH5341> <WH8802> the faithful <WH539> <WH8803>, and plentifully <WH3499> rewardeth <WH7999> <WH8764> the proud <WH1346> doer <WH6213> <WH8802>.
Be of good courage <WH2388> <WH8798>, and he shall strengthen <WH553> <WH8686> your heart <WH3824>, all ye that hope <WH3176> <WH8764> in the YY <WH3068>.
